Description: TAKE A CUP TO THE COFFEMAKER .PUT THE COFFEE
FIRSTLY TAKE A DIRTY BOWLS ,SPOON, CUP USED TO SINKBASIN AND WASHING THEM
FIRST TAKE A APPLE ON THE TABLE ,AND KNIFE CUT THE APPLE
CUT THE BREAD INTO SLICE AND TOAST IT USING A TOASTER.
TAKE A EGG FRY USED A PAN
TAKE A TOMATO AND POT, PREPARING A SOUP IN POT
TAKE A LETTUCE AND POT, PREPARING A SOUP IN POT
TAKE A MUG OF WATER AND BOILED IT IN THE POT
FIND THE EGG . IF SPOILED THROW IT INTO THE BIN
IF SPOILED FRUITS AND VEGETABLES PUT THE BIN AND CLEAR THE FRIDGE

Locate knife. Walk to knife. Pick up knife. Locate plate. Walk to plate. Pick up plate. Locate potato. Walk to potato. Place potato on counter top. Pick up potato. Place potato on plate. Use knife to slick through potato. Place knife in sink. Pick up plate. Locate microwave. Walk to microwave. Open microwave's door. Place plate in microwave. Close microwave's door. Activate microwave. Wait for microwave to ding. Open microwave's door. Pick up plate. Place plate on counter top.

Locate cup. Walk to cup. Pick up cup. Locate wine bottle. Walk to wine bottle. Place cup on counter top in front of wine bottle. Unscrew wine bottle's cap. Pick up wine bottle. Tilt wine bottle to allow its contents to drain into cup. Once cup is full straighten wine bottle. Place wine bottle on the counter top. Screw wine bottle's cap back on. Pick up cup.

Locate apple. Walk to apple. Pick up apple. Locate egg. Walk to egg. Pick up egg. Locate lettuce. Walk to lettuce. Pick up lettuce. Locate tomato. Walk to tomato. Pick up tomato. Locate fridge. Walk to fridge. Open fridge's door. Place apple, egg, lettuce, and tomato in fridge. Close fridge's door.
Locate cup. Walk to cup. Pick up cup. Locate sink. Walk to sink. Place cup in sink basin under the faucet. Activate faucet. Observe cup until it is full. Turn off sink's faucet. Pick up cup.

ocate pan. Walk to pot. Pick up pot. Locate potato. Walk to potato. Place pot on counter top near potato. Pick up potato. Walk to sink. Place potato under faucet. Turn faucet on. Observe that potato is clean. Turn faucet off. Place potato in pot. Locate knife. Walk to knife. Pick up knife. Walk to pot. Slice through potato with knife. Place knife on counter top. Pick up pot. Place pot in sink basin. Turn on faucet. Observe pot until water covers the potato. Turn off faucet. Pick up pot. Locate stove. Walk to stove. Place pot on stove. Activate stove. Wait 15 minutes. Pick up pot. Walk to sink. Empty water into sink basin. Place pot on counter top.
Locate apple slices. Walk to apple slices. Pick up unused apple slices. Locate bin. Walk to bin. Place unused apple slices in bin.

Locate butter knife. Walk to butter knife. Pick up butter knife. Locate fork. Walk to fork. Pick up fork. Locate knife. Walk to knife. Pick up knife. Locate spatula. Walk to spatula. Pick up spatula. Locate spoon. Walk to spoon. Pick up spoon. Locate drawer. Walk to drawer. Open drawer. Place butter knife, fork, knife, spatula and spoon in drawer. Close drawer.

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_16_4
Description: Locate cup. Walk to cup. Pick up cup. Locate sink. Walk to sink. Place cup over sink's basin. Turn cup over. Wait until all liquids have exited the cup. Turn cup rightside up. Place cup in sink.
Locate pot. Walk to pot. Pick up pot. Locate sink. Walk to sink. Hold pot over sink. Flip pot over. Wait until the water has drained from the pot. Flip pot over. Place pot in the sink.
Locate kitchen light switch. Observe how kitchen light switch is activated. Activate kitchen light switch.
Turn on the laptop after finding it.
Take the remote from the coffee table. Use the remote to turn on the television and watch television.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_202_4
Description: Find the watch. Look at the watch to make sure its timing is correct.
Get the pencil, pen, and newspaper. Find the box. Put the 3 items in the box.
Go to the television stand. Take the tissue box. Walk to the bin and put it inside.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_204_4
Description: Walk over to the desk. Find the desk lamp's switch and turn it off.
Pick up the hand phone and slam it down on the black table to crack it.
Find the hand phone. Turn the phone on. Start using it.
Walk to the sofa, grab the pillow, take it off and put it on the floor.
Take the book from the long end table and sit leisurely on the sofa and read it.
